shape_1_per_frame1=
shape_1_per_frame2=j=sqrt(3);    a1=-1/2;    b1=j/2;     x2=x1;
shape_1_per_frame3=
shape_1_per_frame4=
shape_1_per_frame5=c = 1+rand(3)%3;    c1=equal(c,1);   c2=equal(c,2);    c3=equal(c,3);
shape_1_per_frame6=
shape_1_per_frame7=
shape_1_per_frame8=a0=3*(1+j-x1)/(pow(1+j-x1,2)+y1*y1)-(1+j)/(2+j);
shape_1_per_frame9=b0=3*y1/(pow(1+j-x1,2)+y1*y1);
shape_1_per_frame10=
shape_1_per_frame11=fx=a0/(a0*a0+b0*b0);     fy=b0/(a0*a0+b0*b0);
shape_1_per_frame12=   
shape_1_per_frame13=x1 = c1* (3*(1+j-x1)/(pow(1+j-x1,2)+y1*y1)-(1+j)/(2+j)) + c2* (fx*a1-fy*b1) + c3* (fx*a1 +fy*b1);
shape_1_per_frame14=y1 = c1* (3*y1/(pow(1+j-x2,2)+y1*y1))                   + c2* (fx*b1+fy*a1) + c3* (-fx*b1 +fy*a1);
shape_1_per_frame15=
shape_1_per_frame16=
shape_1_per_frame17=z=.13;
shape_1_per_frame18=
shape_1_per_frame19=x=.5+z*x1/q6;     y=.5+z*y1;
shape_1_per_frame20=rad=.1*rad;
